title: Toffee apple bread and butter pudding
ingredients: ['3/4 loaf slightly stale white bread, crusts removed', '125g unsalted butter', '1 large Bramley apple', '1/2 bag dairy toffees', '1/2 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 medium eggs', '60g caster sugar', '300ml semi-skimmed or whole milk', '300ml double cream', '1 tablespoon demerara sugar']
